attributes.action: Substantially reduce Stamp Duty on all domestic property purchases, regardless of value
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I consider the current rate of Stamp Duty to be wholly unreasonable and a positive deterrent to those seeking to Buy, either as  as First Time Buyers or those seeking to sell and buy as established domestic property/house owners.
The current levels (at June 2008)are completely unreasonable and have absolutely no bearing on the low "paper costs" involved in recording purchase transactions.
In reality, the current "grossly unfair levels" represents nothing more than a Politicians desire to exploit home-owners in order to satisfy Political ambitions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
